API CHANGE 2.0


List of the scheduled changes for the GFal 2.0 API

Warning:
this is not a final choice

I. OFFICIAL API :

  • Gfal POSIX lib API:
    • the Common functions API : all common functions
    • the POSIX style API : all POSIX style function

  • Gfal REQUEST lib API :
    • the SRM style API : all SRM functions
    • internal API, use at your own risks LFC_API : internal LFC functions
    • internal API, use at your own risks SFN_API : sfn low level functions
    • internal API, use at your own risks internal functions of gfal : internal functions
